# /public/llms.txt
# Purpose: Plain-text summary for AI/LLM crawlers describing Time 2 Trade, key features, and primary URLs.
# Changelog:
# v1.1.0 - 2026-01-16 - Updated routing to /calendar (primary), added /clock, removed /login.

Time 2 Trade (https://time2.trade)
One-liner: Free market clock and economic calendar for futures and forex day traders, combining a dual-circle session visualization with live economic events and timezone-aware insights.
Who it's for: Traders who time entries/exits around global market sessions (London, New York, Asia) and need economic catalyst context.

Key features:
- Dual-circle session visualization (AM inner ring, PM outer ring)
- Live economic calendar powered by Forex Factory / JBlanked News Calendar
- Timezone intelligence with instant local conversion
- Cloud-synced settings for free accounts (Firestore)
- Customizable sessions, colors, alerts, and overlays
- Responsive web app (desktop, tablet, mobile)
- Favorites, notes, and event exports (CSV/JSON)

Primary URLs:
- Home/landing: https://time2.trade/
- Economic calendar: https://time2.trade/calendar
- Market clock: https://time2.trade/clock
- About: https://time2.trade/about
- Privacy: https://time2.trade/privacy
- Terms: https://time2.trade/terms

Contact: @time2_trade (https://x.com/time2_trade) | support@time2.trade
Usage: Free to use; no trading advice provided. Suitable for informational/organizational use by traders.
